name: You have applied for a final order (JOINT) (One Applicant Applied)
body:
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name))

You have applied for a final order, which is the court document that will legally end your ((isDivorce??marriage))((isDissolution??civil partnership)).

^Your ((partner)) also has to apply because you are doing a joint application. You will be told what you can do to move the application forwards if they do not apply by ((now plus 14 days)). 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: You have applied for a final order
